text: Konthoujam Nongarol (), also spelt as the Konthoucham Nongkalol, is an ancient Meitei literary narrative work, about Chingphulon Konthousu, a lady from Konthou clan, ascending to the Heaven. The story describes about the love between a mortal and a deity. It also mentions about how the ancient people perform ceremony for the death. ==Related pages== * Konthoujam Tampha Lairembi * Khoriphaba * Poireiton Khunthok ==Sources== * Konthoujam Tampha Lairembi | PDF | Prayer | Religion And Belief * Three millennia mythology still resonates at Konthoujam Lairembi By Phanjoubam Chingkheinganba ==Reference== Category:Meitei literature
title: Konthoujam Nongarol
